review: I am not happy with the fire box so far.  I haven't had the time or wanted to get on the phone with amazon yet to find out what is the problem.  Every time I try and watch something it buffers constantly.  On Netflix and amazon.  it's not even usable.  I also own a chromecast.  I can unplug my fire tv and plug in my chromecast and watch the same thing and it won't buffer once.  I don't understand the problem, but I am very disappointed

review: I really like my Fire TV. I decided on the Fire TV, because I use Amazon products like the Kindle eReaders and Kindle Fire tablet. They work well together. I am a Prime member and stream Amazon Instant videos. I also use Netflix and other streaming services, so I wanted a unit that would handle Amazon content well as well as other content. This does a great job. It integrates well with the Fire tablet. I absolutley love the voice remote. It is very easy to setup and use right out of the box like most Amazon products.
